name: Peruvian Curly
description:
Available in 14-30in
This hair is sold per bundle.

Peruvian Virgin Hair derives from the North East corner of Peru, right on the Amazon river on the borders of Colombia and Brazil. This hair is exclusive, rare and sought after. Peruvian hair has NO expiration date like all other types of virgin hair and can be re-used over and over. Peruvian Hair Extensions are great for sleek straight styles as well as short and edgy styles. Peruvian hair is fairly new to the market. It is very exotic and blends well with natural or relaxed hair textures. Peruvian hair is very soft, lustrous, and carries lots of volume. All wave patterns can be worn straight, yet they will curl back to its original state when wet.


Hair Life Span: 9-12 Months
 
How to use: Sew hair in. (Recommended)
 
Hair Weight: All bundles are 3.5 oz
 
Bundles needed for full head: 2 or 3 Bundles.
 
Can the hair be colored or texturized: Yes
 
Shipping:  Typically takes 2-7 days, Orders will be shipped out via USPS Priority Delivery with Insurance.

name: Mongolian Kinky Curl
description:
Available in 14-28in
This hair is sold per bundle.
Mongolian kinky curl hair would be slightly coarser than Malaysian hair in regards to texture. Its definitely able to blend well with natural and relaxed textures. Mongolian virgin hair has a thick/coarse hair shaft, differentiating it from all other forms of virgin hair. This form of virgin hair maintains its soft texture, however carries a heavier density yet still very lightweight.  

Hair Life Span: 9-12 Months
 
How to use: Sew hair in. (Recommended)
 
Hair Weight: All bundles are 3.5 oz
 
Bundles needed for full head: 2 or 3 Bundles.
 
Can the hair be colored or texturized: Yes
 
Shipping:  Typically takes 2-7 days, Orders will be shipped out via USPS Priority Delivery.

name: Malaysian Curly
description:
Available in 14-28in
This hair is sold per bundle.
Because of its curly texture,  this hair requires lots of moisture and maintenance. Each day you will need to activate the curls with a water/conditioner mix and condition it with a moisturizing conditioner often. This texture is best for someone experienced with both Virgin and curly hair textures. If this is your first Virgin or curly hair purchase, its recommended that you start with only two bundles until you acquire and are comfortable with your curly hair regimen. Hair has minimal shedding and does not tangle.

Hair Life Span: 9-12 Months
 
How to use: Sew hair in. (Recommended)
 
Hair Weight: All bundles are 3.5oz
 
Bundles needed for full head: 2 or 3 Bundles.
 
Can the hair be colored or texturized: Yes
 
Shipping:  Typically takes 2-7 days, Orders will be shipped out via USPS Priority Delivery.

Available in 14-28 inches
